entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as the one who is worried about something and is trying to get going. She is also seen scolding her children for making noise.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone who agrees with Mrs. Weasley and promises to tell Dumbledore about something.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who should be informed about something.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge's office is where Mrs. Weasley and Sirius are going to go together.

entities.name: molly
entities.description: Molly is mentioned as the wife of Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is someone who is being covered by Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley might be dropping in for dinner according to Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the children who are making noise and being scolded by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is another child who is making noise and being scolded by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is also one of the children who are making noise and being scolded by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who has just arrived at Grimmauld Place and is having lunch with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the people who are sitting down to have lunch with Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is also one of the people who are having lunch with Harry.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is someone who has had an encounter with Harry that has left him feeling giddy and relieved.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who looks less ugly as the gloomy house seems warmer and more welcoming.

relationships.description: Mrs. Weasley and Sirius agree to tell Dumbledore about something.
Mr. Weasley is covering for Tonks.
Kingsley might be dropping in for dinner according to Mr. Weasley.
